snippet: What happens when death and violence on a massive scale are covered up, as they were in China's Great Leap Forward, which ended 50 years ago this year but is still a taboo topic in China?
abstract: What happens when death and violence on a massive scale are covered up, as they were in China's Great Leap Forward, which ended 50 years ago this year but is still a taboo topic in China?

headline.main: The Enduring Legacy of China's Great Famine
